name: Wizardly Chaos
description:
My submission for the Miziziziz Game Jam 2020! There's probably a ton of bugs, but I tried to patch out the ones I could find. There's a tutorial and five levels, including a boss fight at the end!

If there's anything wrong with the game or anything like that, please let me know! I was kinda rushing to export at the very end, so I almost definitely screwed something up there...
